/* IndvdlUserDac.SelectIndvdlUserList */ SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.* ,ROWNUM AS "RowNumber" ,COUNT(*) OVER() AS "TotalCount" FROM ( SELECT A.USER_ID AS "UserId" /* 사용자ID */ , A.USER_NM AS "UserNm" /* 사용자명 */ , A.TELNO AS "Telno" /* 전화번호 */ , FN_CRYPTO(A.MBTLNUM,'D') AS "Mbtlnum" /* 휴대폰번호 */ , A.EMAIL_ADRES AS "EmailAdres" /* 이메일주소 */ , A.BRTHDY AS "Brthdy" /* 생년월일 */ , A.ADRES_SE_CODE AS "AdresSeCode" /* 주소구분코드 */ , A.ZIP AS "Zip" /* 우편번호 */ , A.BASS_ADRES AS "BassAdres" /* 기본주소 */ , A.DETAIL_ADRES AS "DetailAdres" /* 상세주소 */ , A.PASSWORD_HINT_SE_CODE AS "PasswordHintSeCode" /* 비밀번호힌트구분코드 */ , A.PASSWORD_HINT_CNSR AS "PasswordHintCnsr" /* 비밀번호힌트정답 */ , A.EMAIL_RECPTN_AT AS "EmailRecptnAt" /* 이메일수신여부 */ , A.SMS_RECPTN_AT AS "SmsRecptnAt" /* SMS수신여부 */ , A.INDVDL_USER_STTUS_CODE AS "IndvdlUserSttusCode" /* 개인사용자상태코드 */ , A.REGIST_DT AS "RegistDt" /* 등록일시 */ , A.REGISTER_ID AS "RegisterId" /* 등록자ID */ , A.UPDT_DT AS "UpdtDt" /* 수정일시 */ , A.UPDUSR_ID AS "UpdusrId" /* 수정자ID */ , A.REGISTER_SE_CODE AS "RegisterSeCode" /* 등록자구분코드 */ , A.UPDUSR_SE_CODE AS "UpdusrSeCode" /* 수정자구분코드 */ , FN_USER_NM(A.REGISTER_SE_CODE, REGISTER_ID) AS "RegisterNm" /* 등록자명 */ , FN_USER_NM(A.UPDUSR_SE_CODE, UPDUSR_ID) AS "UpdusrNm" /* 수정자명 */ FROM TN_INDVDL_USER A, TN_USER B WHERE B.USER_ID = A.USER_ID
AND A.INDVDL_USER_STTUS_CODE = #SearchIndvdlUserSttusCode#
AND A.USER_NM LIKE '%' || #SearchText# || '%' /* 사용자명 */
AND A.USER_ID LIKE '%' || #SearchText# || '%' /* 사용자ID */
AND A.TELNO LIKE '%' || #SearchText# || '%' /* 전화번호 */
AND FN_CRYPTO(A.MBTLNUM,'D') LIKE '%' || #SearchText# || '%' /* 핸드폰번호 */
AND A.EMAIL_ADRES LIKE '%' || #SearchText# || '%' /* 이메일주소 */
ORDER BY A.USER_ID DESC ) A ) WHERE "RowNumber" BETWEEN #StartIndex# AND #EndIndex#

/* IndvdlUserDac.SelectIndvdlUser */ SELECT USER_ID AS "UserId" /* 사용자ID */ , USER_NM AS "UserNm" /* 사용자명 */ , TELNO AS "Telno" /* 전화번호 */ , FN_CRYPTO(MBTLNUM,'D') AS "Mbtlnum" /* 휴대폰번호 */ , EMAIL_ADRES AS "EmailAdres" /* 이메일주소 */ , BRTHDY AS "Brthdy" /* 생년월일 */ , ADRES_SE_CODE AS "AdresSeCode" /* 주소구분코드 */ , ZIP AS "Zip" /* 우편번호 */ , BASS_ADRES AS "BassAdres" /* 기본주소 */ , DETAIL_ADRES AS "DetailAdres" /* 상세주소 */ , PASSWORD_HINT_SE_CODE AS "PasswordHintSeCode" /* 비밀번호힌트구분코드 */ , PASSWORD_HINT_CNSR AS "PasswordHintCnsr" /* 비밀번호힌트정답 */ , EMAIL_RECPTN_AT AS "EmailRecptnAt" /* 이메일수신여부 */ , SMS_RECPTN_AT AS "SmsRecptnAt" /* SMS수신여부 */ , INDVDL_USER_STTUS_CODE AS "IndvdlUserSttusCode" /* 개인사용자상태코드 */ , REGIST_DT AS "RegistDt" /* 등록일시 */ , REGISTER_ID AS "RegisterId" /* 등록자ID */ , UPDT_DT AS "UpdtDt" /* 수정일시 */ , UPDUSR_ID AS "UpdusrId" /* 수정자ID */ , REGISTER_SE_CODE AS "RegisterSeCode" /* 등록자구분코드 */ , UPDUSR_SE_CODE AS "UpdusrSeCode" /* 수정자구분코드 */ , FN_USER_NM(REGISTER_SE_CODE, REGISTER_ID) AS "RegisterNm" /* 등록자명 */ , FN_USER_NM(UPDUSR_SE_CODE, UPDUSR_ID) AS "UpdusrNm" /* 수정자명 */ FROM TN_INDVDL_USER WHERE USER_ID = #UserId#
statements.insert: /* IndvdlUserDac.InsertIndvdlUser */ INSERT INTO TN_INDVDL_USER ( USER_ID ,USER_NM ,TELNO ,MBTLNUM ,EMAIL_ADRES ,BRTHDY ,ADRES_SE_CODE ,ZIP ,BASS_ADRES ,DETAIL_ADRES ,PASSWORD_HINT_SE_CODE ,PASSWORD_HINT_CNSR ,EMAIL_RECPTN_AT ,SMS_RECPTN_AT ,INDVDL_USER_STTUS_CODE ,REGIST_DT ,REGISTER_ID ,UPDT_DT ,UPDUSR_ID ,REGISTER_SE_CODE ,UPDUSR_SE_CODE ,IPIN_INNB ) VALUES ( #UserId# ,#UserNm# ,#Telno# ,FN_CRYPTO(#Mbtlnum#,'E') ,#EmailAdres# ,#Brthdy# ,#AdresSeCode# ,#Zip# ,#BassAdres# ,#DetailAdres# ,#PasswordHintSeCode# ,#PasswordHintCnsr# ,#EmailRecptnAt# ,#SmsRecptnAt# ,#IndvdlUserSttusCode# , SYSDATE ,#RegisterId# , SYSDATE ,#UpdusrId# ,#RegisterSeCode# ,#UpdusrSeCode# ,#IpinInnb# )
statements.update: /* IndvdlUserDac.DeleteIndvdlUser */ DELETE FROM TN_INDVDL_USER WHERE USER_ID = #UserId#

/* IndvdlUserDac.UpdateIndvdlUser */ UPDATE TN_INDVDL_USER SET USER_NM = #UserNm# ,TELNO = #Telno# ,MBTLNUM = FN_CRYPTO(#Mbtlnum#,'E') ,EMAIL_ADRES = #EmailAdres# ,BRTHDY = #Brthdy# ,ADRES_SE_CODE = #AdresSeCode# ,ZIP = #Zip# ,BASS_ADRES = #BassAdres# ,DETAIL_ADRES = #DetailAdres# ,PASSWORD_HINT_SE_CODE = #PasswordHintSeCode# ,PASSWORD_HINT_CNSR = #PasswordHintCnsr# ,EMAIL_RECPTN_AT = #EmailRecptnAt# ,SMS_RECPTN_AT = #SmsRecptnAt# ,INDVDL_USER_STTUS_CODE = #IndvdlUserSttusCode# ,UPDT_DT = SYSDATE ,UPDUSR_ID = #UpdusrId# ,UPDUSR_SE_CODE = #UpdusrSeCode# WHERE USER_ID = #UserId#
statements.select: /* IndvdlUserDac.SelectIpinExistYn */ SELECT DECODE(COUNT(USER_ID),0,'N','Y')AS "ExistYn" FROM TN_INDVDL_USER WHERE IPIN_INNB = #IpinInnb#
